sub_title: Country Controller - The Netherlands & Belgium at National Oilwell Varco
summary:
• Progressed in career while working in the oil and gas industry and in industrial real estate while working in The Netherlands, United Kingdom and the USA.  
• Flexible, motivated leader that can develop a team, motivate staff, solve integrated problems and start up a regional financial reporting hub.
• Proactive in managing the financial effect of both an upside and downside of business cycles. 

Specialties: Oil and gas rig manufacturing, global industrial real estate development construction, oil and gas exploration and production offshore platforms, power plants and pipeline installations.
